projects.title: casecobra
projects.tagLine: a fullstack e-commerce shop for your custom phone cases
projects.description: Developed casecobra, a responsive web app enabling customers to upload photos and create personalized mobile phone cases. Implemented a user-friendly interface for seamless photo uploads and case customization across all devices.

projects.title: Chat8
projects.description: Developed Chat8 , a real-time chatting application ensuring seamless and instant communication. Implemented advanced features such as live message updates for an enhanced user experience. Utilized WebSocket technology to achieve low-latency messaging and real-time interaction

projects.title: careTracker
projects.tagLine: A full-stack school buses management system
projects.description: The system leverages real-time tracking technology and a user-friendly mobile application to provide parents with the ability to monitor their child's bus location, ensuring timely and secure drop-off and pick-up. The system architecture integrates Global Positioning System (GPS) technology to enable accurate tracking of school buses.

projects.title: AqwaMarq
projects.tagLine: Applying watermarks on PDFs and images
projects.description: Developed a cross-platform compatible application for applying watermarks on PDFs and pictures.

projects.title: Collaborative Whiteboard
projects.description: A fullstack collaborative whiteboard with multi-room support, keycloak authentication, and realtime web-socket enabled communication.
